title:
ADDING APPLICATIONS 
use the application name   
Example: Firefox

ADDING WEB ADDRESSES 
use the full web address    
Example: https://github.com

ADDING files 
use the file path and change \ to \\    
Example: C:\Users\user_name   change to   C:\\users\\user_name

ADDING DIRECTORY 
use the directory path and change \ to \\
Example: C:\Users\user_name   change to   C:\\Users\\user_name
